Summary: bright large light over albuquerque..so bright people thought it was a second moon. hovered then dimmed after a few hours
divs: Sighting Detailssep. 22 2012 albuquerque. unusually bright object in daytime sky..very bright stationary. continued "hovering till past nightfall then a single bright orange light appeared in center and it appeared to be moving away (it got smaller and dimmer. witnessed by at least 20 people ( my whole appt complex plus people at the stores in the area. news sad meteor shower but object was stable and unmoving. plus wrong color. the light eminating from object was extraordinarily bright. brighter than the moon wich was pretty bright in of itsself tonight. noticed object when neighbors where staring at it. I watched it for a couple of hours. made me feel kinda small.
trends: There have been 129 other sightings in Albuquerque
There was one other sighting in Albuquerque on or around September 22nd 2012
